definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: Thick spears of asparagus and fennel were draped with thinly sliced ham.
sentences.chinese: 厚厚的芦笋和茴香夹在切的薄薄的火腿片里。

sentences.english: Wrap the ham around the scallop . Put the scallop back onto the shell.
sentences.chinese: 将火腿包在扇贝上，并放回扇贝壳中待用。

sentences.english: It's a honey ham with a sweet glaze.
sentences.chinese: 这是加上糖汁的蜜汁火腿。

sentences.english: He had his habitual breakfast, hamburger and ham sandwich every morning.
sentences.chinese: 他每天早上都是惯常的早餐，汉堡包和火腿三明治。

sentences.english: Hunca Munca stood up in her chair, and chopped at the ham with another lead knife.
sentences.chinese: 亨卡忙卡从椅子上站起来，用另一把铅皮餐刀砍火腿。

sentences.english: Parma ham, fresh mozzarella, arugula salad filling with tomato sauce.
sentences.chinese: 巴马火腿，马苏里拉，芝麻草和番茄酱。

sentences.english: Iberico ham, fine herbs croutons, Mediterranean Caesar dressing.
sentences.chinese: 伊比利亚火腿，香草面包丁，地中海沙拉汁。

sentences.english: One half will become salty flavored duck, the other half will become ham.
sentences.chinese: 一半做成盐水鸭，做成金华火腿。

sentences.english: Food gum's application in ham was studied.
sentences.chinese: 探讨食用胶在西式火腿中的应用。

sentences.english: We serve ham or bacon with your eggs. Which would you prefer ?
sentences.chinese: 我们提供火腿或腌肉夹蛋，您要哪一种？

sentences.english: The processing course of modernization and standardization was put forward for high quality of dry-cured ham.
sentences.chinese: 提出了生产高品质干腌火腿的现代化加工方法。

sentences.english: Wrap the ham around the scallop. Put the scallop back onto the shell.
sentences.chinese: 将火腿包在扇贝上，并放回扇贝壳中待用。

sentences.english: We have bread, ham, banana, milk, orange juice and cookie.
sentences.chinese: 有面包，火腿，香蕉，牛奶，桔子汁和饼干。

definition: tofu skin (made by drying the skin that forms on the surface of soymilk during cooking, and therefore not actually made from tofu)
